quickstart.title: WebSphere logs, metrics and other data
quickstart.header: Including WebSphere and Java/J2EE server and application log files, WebSphere metrics via JMX, JMS messages.

option.title: Get the Splunk for WebSphere Application Server app
option.summary: This app indexes WebSphere Application Server logs and metrics. It also contains dashboards and searches for WebSphere Application Server data.

option.title: Collect messages from JMS
option.summary: Splunk can programmatically collect messages from JMS by running and collecting the output from a script.

option.title: Consume WebSphere server logs on this Splunk server
option.summary: Configure Splunk to index any WebSphere data available to this Splunk server.

option.title: Forward WebSphere data to this Splunk server from another server
option.summary: Use Splunk's universal forwarder to send data from any machine to your Splunk server
